name: Bulgur and Mint Salad
keywords: bulgur, italian parsley, mint leaves, raw, vegan, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 large carrot (about 8 ounces), peeled and grated into strips on the large-hole side of cheese grater (about 3/4 cup)
4 cloves garlic, peeled, crushed and minced (about 1 tablespoon)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the bulgur in a saucepan and cover it with 4 cups of cool tap water. Soak for at least 3 to 4 hours (or overnight, if desired).
Meanwhile, coarsely chop the mint and parsley together. (There should be 1 1/2 cups total.)
Drain the bulgur in a sieve for 10 to 20 minutes. Place the drained bulgur in a bowl and add the carrot, scallions, garlic, salt, Tabasco, lemon juice and oil. Mix well.
